configuration.name: 项目行业图
configuration.query: select CASE WHEN (c.c_industry1=NULL OR c.c_industry1='') THEN '未知' ELSE c.c_industry1 END c_industry1,count(p.c_id) c_count from t_project p INNER JOIN t_customer c ON p.c_customer_id=c.c_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT c_type1,MIN(c_sort_id) c_sort_id FROM t_dict_industry GROUP BY c_type1 ) i ON c.c_industry1=i.c_type1 WHERE 1=1 GROUP BY c.c_industry1 ORDER BY i.c_sort_id
